traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: Until a stryx speaks or opens its mouth, it is indistinguishable from a normal owl.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The stryx doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The stryx's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can cast the following spell, requiring no components: * 3/day: comprehend languages

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.desc: The stryx has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.
